title: Parallels Desktop 18 for Mac Pro Edition | Run Windows on Mac Virtual Machine Software | 1 Year Subscription [Mac Key Card]
description: Mac Pro Edition runs Windows on Mac for developers, designers, testers, engineers, and experienced power users. Tailored for users seeking powerful performance and extended functionality for running non-Mac apps on their Apple M-series chip or Intel-based Mac. Switch between Mac Windows applications, or open Windows files and apps from the Mac Dock. Copy and paste text/images and drag-and-drop files between OSs. Run Windows applications inside a virtual machine, develop and test apps or websites across different operating systems, and use Vagrant, Packer, and other development tools. Powerful performance fuels applications like AutoCAD and Visual Studio. Plus, enjoy VM templates, linked clones, and the ability to manage your virtual machines from a command line interface. Automatically optimize your virtual machine settings for your primary usage, or instantly allocate the optimal amount of CPU and memory resources for max productivity. Enjoy 24/7 premium support. Includes Parallels Toolbox with 40+ tools to simplify everyday tasks.
